AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions (incorporating a juliet balcony) and installation of 3 no. rooflights to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The proposed dormer and rooflights are considered to fall within the parameters of Classes B and C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and would be lawful.

Condition Condition 5 (Materials Samples) of planning application ref 23/00567/OUT allowed on Appeal APP/Z5630/W/23/3321649 states:'No development shall commence until details / samples of the materials  to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension  hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details / samples.'Office comment: The current application follows a refused application, ref 23/03370/CLC on 01.03.2024.In addition to the previously submitted information, the applicant has confirmed the following:- The proposed windows would be white UPVC by the Rose Collection and in style as per approved elevations, with vertical and horizontal glazing bars. - The proposed window sills would be made of precast concrete and the horizontal banding would be made of rendered block. - The proposed main entrance door would be made of aluminium by Smart Architectural Aluminium- The proposed mortar and the bricks are considered to be acceptable - The proposed aluminium balconies would be powder coated in black. The applicant has submitted samples of the proposed render and brick. As such, the submitted information is considered to be sufficient to ensure satisfactory appearance of the proposal. Therefore, the details submitted in relation to condition 5 are hereby approved.
The fee required for your pre- application is Â£ 300.00.  Payment can be made online via the Kingston council website, via our Contact Centre on 020 8547 5002.
